str.description: Affects melee damage, carrying capacity, and certain physical skills.

sta.description: Determines hit points, endurance, and resistance to physical effects.

dex.description: Influences attack accuracy, defense, and trade skill success rates.

agi.description: Affects defense, dodge chance, and some ranged combat abilities.

int.description: Increases mana pool for casters and affects spell damage for intelligence-based casters.

wis.description: Enhances mana regeneration and spell effectiveness for wisdom-based casters.

cha.description: Influences NPC interactions, pet control abilities, and certain social skills.
